text: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُوا۟ ۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرْعَوْنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ

translation.en.sahih: So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -
translation.id.indonesian: Maka Allah memeliharanya dari kejahatan tipu daya mereka, dan Fir'aun beserta kaumnya dikepung oleh azab yang amat buruk.
